channel.title: National Geographic on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in National Geographic on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Ghost Elephants’ Review: Werner Herzog Remains Our Most Intrepid Interdimensional Explorer in Beguilingly Spiritual Nature Doc
item.description: The German director follows conservationist Steve Boyes and expert trackers into the Angolan highlands in search of a possibly mythical herd of XL pachyderms.

item.title: ‘Ghost Elephants’ Review: Werner Herzog Remains Our Most Intrepid Interdimensional Explorer in Beguilingly Spiritual Nature Doc
item.description: The German director follows conservationist Steve Boyes and expert trackers into the Angolan highlands in search of a possibly mythical herd of XL pachyderms.

item.title: ‘Lost in the Jungle’ Review: ‘Free Solo’ Directors Capably Tackle a Remarkable Tale of Survival in the Amazon for Nat Geo
item.description: Elizabeth Chai Vasarhelyi, Jimmy Chin and Juan Camilo Cruz tell the story of the Mucutuy siblings and the dueling rescue missions to save their lives in 2023.

item.title: ‘Lost in the Jungle’ Review: ‘Free Solo’ Directors Capably Tackle a Remarkable Tale of Survival in the Amazon for Nat Geo
item.description: Elizabeth Chai Vasarhelyi, Jimmy Chin and Juan Camilo Cruz tell the story of the Mucutuy siblings and the dueling rescue missions to save their lives in 2023.

item.title: Venice: Werner Herzog Doc ‘Ghost Elephants’ Sells to National Geographic (Exclusive)
item.description: The new documentary from the director of ‘Grizzly Man’ and ‘Cave of Forgotten Time’ will stream on Hulu and Disney+.

item.title: Venice: Werner Herzog Doc ‘Ghost Elephants’ Sells to National Geographic (Exclusive)
item.description: The new documentary from the director of ‘Grizzly Man’ and ‘Cave of Forgotten Time’ will stream on Hulu and Disney+.

item.title: 20 years after Katrina, NatGeo and New Orleans remember
item.description: 20 years ago, Ivor Van Heerden warned of impending disaster in New Orleans. Are his warnings still going unheeded?

item.title: 20 years after Katrina, New Orleans remembers
item.description: 20 years ago, Ivor Van Heerden warned of impending disaster in New Orleans. Are his warnings still going unheeded?

item.title: Chris Hemsworth Faces Fears in Trailer for ‘Limitless: Live Better Now’
item.description: In the National Geographic show chronicling Hemsworth’s ongoing search for longevity, the actor scales 600-ft walls and learns the drums to perform in front of 70,000 Ed Sheeran fans.

item.title: Chris Hemsworth Faces Fears in Trailer for ‘Limitless: Live Better Now’
